queries.queryString: _sourceCategory=messages | where source = "ciscoasa" |keyvalue regex "\s(.*?): (.*?)," keys "Classification" as Classification | keyvalue regex "\s(.*?): (.*?)," keys "Message" as message| count by  _messagetime, endace_pivot_to_vision, log, message, Classification, src_ip, dest_ip
_sourceCategory=messages | where source = "ciscoasa" | count by src_ip | sort by _count | limit 10
_sourceCategory=messages | where source = "ciscoasa" | parse regex "Protocol: (?<Protocol>\w{1,3})" | count by Protocol | limit 10
_sourceCategory=messages | where source = "ciscoasa" | parse regex "ApplicationProtocol: (?<ApplicationProtocol>\w{1,25})" | count by ApplicationProtocol | limit 20
_sourceCategory=messages | where source = "ciscoasa" | keyvalue regex "\s(.*?): (.*?)," keys "Classification" as Classification | count by Classification | sort by _count | limit 10

(_sourceCategory=messages)
| where source = "FTD-1-430001" |keyvalue regex "\s(.*?): (.*?)," keys "Classification" as Classification | keyvalue regex "\s(.*?): (.*?)," keys "Message" as message| count by _messagetime, endace_pivot_to_vision, log, message, Classification, src_ip, dest_ip

(_sourceCategory=messages)
| where source = "FTD-1-430001" | count by src_ip | sort by _count | limit 10

(_sourceCategory=messages)
| where source = "FTD-1-430001" | parse regex "Protocol: (?<Protocol>\w{1,10})" | count by Protocol | limit 10

(_sourceCategory=messages)
| where source = "FTD-1-430001" | keyvalue regex "\s(.*?): (.*?)," keys "Classification" as Classification | count by Classification | sort by _count | limit 10

(_sourceCategory=messages)
| where source = "FTD-1-430001" | parse regex "ApplicationProtocol: (?<ApplicationProtocol>\w{1,25})" | count by ApplicationProtocol | limit 20

(_sourceCategory=messages)
| where source = "Palo Alto Networks" | split log delim='|' extract 5 as Threat | keyvalue regex "=(.*?) " "app" | count by _messagetime, endace_pivot_to_vision, log, Threat, app, src_ip, dest_ip
_sourceCategory=messages | where source = "Palo Alto Networks" | count by src_ip | sort by _count | limit 10
_sourceCategory=messages | where source = "Palo Alto Networks" |  split log delim='|' extract 5 as Threat | count by Threat | sort by _count | limit 10
_sourceCategory=messages | where source = "Palo Alto Networks" | keyvalue regex "=(.*?) " "app" | count by app | sort by _count | limit 10
_sourceCategory=messages | where source = "Palo Alto Networks" |keyvalue regex "=(.*?) " "protocol" | count by protocol | sort by _count | limit 10

(_sourceCategory=suricata)
 | count by _messagetime, endace_pivot_to_vision, log, src_ip, dest_ip
_sourceCategory=suricata | count by src_ip | sort by _count | limit 10
_sourceCategory=Suricata |parse regex "proto.....(?<proto>\w{1,10})" | count by proto | sort by _count | limit 10
_sourceCategory=suricata |parse regex "dest_port...(?<dest_port>\d{1,10})" | count by dest_port | sort by _count | limit 10
_sourceCategory=suricata |parse regex "event_type.....(?<event_type>\w{1,10})" | count by event_type | sort by _count | limit 10
_sourceCategory=zeek | count by source_ip | sort by _count | limit 10

_sourceCategory=zeek | split log delim='	' extract 10 as smb_file, 9 as smb_location
| where %"log.file.name" = "smb_files.log" | count by _messagetime, endace_pivot_to_vision, log, smb_file, smb_location, source_ip, dest_ip | limit 30

((_sourceCategory=zeek))
| split log delim='	' extract 10 as smb_file
| where %"log.file.name" = "smb_files.log"
| count smb_file
| sort by _count
| limit 20
_sourceCategory=zeek | parse regex field=_raw "\\t(?<port>\d{1,3})\\t-" | count by port | limit 10
_sourceCategory=zeek | count by dest_ip | sort by _count | limit 10
